channel.title: Mysql help [PI]
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering how I can fix/remove mysql in a source. Reason being: [code]Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,293,677,038,388 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. Unable to connect to MySQL Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I get that every time I try to run my server.

item.title: Mysql help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DcnScape DcnScape
item.description:
@DcnScape wrote:

@echo off title DeltaScape java ItemReplace pause
I don’t think that is right, I might be wrong. If it isn’t right could you please tell me…

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

[quote=“DcnScape, post:4, topic:375777”]I have version C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6(67).0_16 for jdk. Should I download the latest version? And no I am not using ‘Linux’. And yes I am using the new Overload X source :p[/quote]i hawe it removed so if ur not in a rush id upload n give u link 2maro add my msn davec1153@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“DcnScape, post:4, topic:375777”]I have version C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6(67).0_16 for jdk. Should I download the latest version? And no I am not using ‘Linux’. And yes I am using the new Overload X source :p[/quote]Oh that’s probably fine, I was just wondering if you had a strange version on linux.

Try downloading the latest JDBC package, as you may be using a shit one.

It may also be a problem with your db server settings, but try replacing the driver first.

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

You may be using a bad version of JDBC or JDK.

Also, are you on linux?

Read full topic
